ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 832
ygData.msgSnippet: I m on a 768/128 DSL and even I get wild lag spikes in POK on occasion, I don t doubt that would be enough to  bomb most any dialup. ... From: S.V. Clark
ygData.messageBody:
I'm on a 768/128 DSL and even I get wild lag spikes in POK on occasion, I
don't doubt that would be enough to bomb most any dialup.
----- Original Message -----
From: S.V. Clark <masteradept007@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 02, 2003 11:42 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 832


> I play on a DU...and I have LoY and all of the other
> Xpansions running and I do fine. I have a few LD
> problems but no more than 4 in a given week and all
> seem to happen either in Bazaar or POK.
